snippet.title: Vampires Fable -  Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Hey! I'm Kate :) 

I professionally do 3D Level Art for game dev. My dream is to create my own indie game. In my spare time I'm trying to create my first game as a solo game developer. I even have a free demo to play already! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3160950/Vampires_Fable/

My game is Vampires Fable, and it's a stylized 3D online cooperative game for two people, combining arcade and puzzle game elements. I pay very close attention to the storyline, which is an important part of the gameplay. 

If you are interested, I encourage you to download the free demo version of Vampires Fable from the Steam platform. 

Your opinions are extremely important to me! After playing the demo, please share your impressions. These will help me continue to improve the game to make the full version of Vampires Fable even more engaging and satisfying. You can join the Discord server where you can find another person to play with, share your opinion, comments and feedback: 
discord.gg/chJwWZsF4g

If you would like to support me in the creative process, I would be happy to have a coffee :)

buymeacoffee.com/lacrimanoctis
